subject: Pedals
description_text:
I'm about to buy some of your pedals.
I just have one question. Do these plug into my PC via USB or do they
attach to wheelbase? I'm needing pedals that plug in USB. Do I need to buy
any accessories for that kind of connection?

conversations.body_text: Hi Jon Lamb,  Please connect the USB cable from our pedal set directly to a USB 3.0 port on the back of your PC. There's no need to use any other devices or connect it through a wheelbase.

Ty very much.
One more question. What is the difference between the pro and the plus and
pro upgraded.

On Wed, Jul 9, 2025, 10:46 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Jon Lamb, These pedal models represent different stages of our product upgrade process. You only need to choose either the PlusX or ProX Ultra, as they are the latest versions.      https://www.simsonn.com/collections/pedals

Is one a higher build quality than the other? is there a difference between
the elastomers? is one for beginners one for professionals? or is one just
newer than the other Can you help me compare the two somehow

On Thu, Jul 10, 2025, 8:25 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Jon Lamb,    These are our two newest pedals, the Pro X Ultra has an adjustable hydraulic lever for the more seasoned pro rider. It has lights that give feedback based on game telemetry data, and a much nicer light and shape. If you don't need these features, the Plus X pedals will be better value for money as they have the same elastomers and hydraulics.

Awesome, thanks for the info!

Are y'all willing to sell the hell rest that comes with the pro x. I have
the base plate I bought with my plus x. But like the heel rest

On Thu, Jul 17, 2025, 5:57 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Jon Lamb,    The Pro X's heel plate and light bar module can be mounted on the Plus's base plate, but the light feature is not available. What other accessories do you need.
